Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) targetObj ) ; Create the rogue base. The base position must be at least ; 120 light-seconds away from anything else. (setq targetObj (sysCreateStation &HS_stRogueBaseRescue; (sysVectorRandom cscObj (random 400 600) 120 "t") ) ) (msnSetData gSource 'targetID (objGetID targetObj))
; Create the rescue ship (setq rescueObj (sysCreateShip &HS_scAurochs; cscObj &HS_svCommonwealthFleet;)) (shpOrder rescueObj 'dock targetObj) (shpOrder rescueObj 'wait (random 10 20)) (shpOrder rescueObj 'dock cscObj) (shpOrder rescueObj 'wait 5) (shpOrder rescueObj 'gate) (msnSetData gSource 'rescueID (objGetID rescueObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource rescueObj)
; Encounter (if (leq (random 1 100) 60) (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (add 500 (random 0 100)) rescueObj &HS_etRogueAmbush1; (random 120 200)) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked:
(switch ; Docked with target base (and (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'rescueID)) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetData gSource 'targetID)) ) (block Nil (plyMessage gPlayer "Extraction commencing")
; Add some encounters (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (+ 500 (random 0 100)) aObjDocked &HS_etRogueAmbush2; (random 120 200)) (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (+ 1000 (random 0 100)) aObjDocked &HS_etRogueAmbush1; (random 120 200)) )
; Docked with CSC (and (= (objGetID aObjDocked) (msnGetData gSource 'rescueID)) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) ) (msnSuccess gSource) )
Events.OnCompleted: (switch (= aReason 'failure) (block Nil ; Demote player (objSetData gPlayerShip 'fleetXP 400) (objSetData gPlayerShip 'fleetLevel 2) ) )

Language.Text:
The XO walks up to you.
"Good to see you pilot. We've got a mission for you."

"OK, this is a high-profile rescue mission, so I don't want any screw-ups!
"Two of our weapons designers have been kidnapped by rogue fleet elements. We're sending an Aurochs transport with an extraction team to rescue our Einsteins. All you've got to do is protect the transport to the rogue base and back.
"Clear?"
Language.String: "Get the hell out of here then!"
"What is your major malfunction!? Get back out there and complete your mission!"
Language.Text:
"That's what I get for counting on you!
"You're demoted back to Privateer! Now get out of my sight!"
Language.String: "Outstanding mission! Now we can put those Einsteins back to work!"
Language.Text: Your mission is to protect an Aurochs transport carrying an extraction team to rescue the weapons designers.
